curam.util.jmx.extpoints

Class ExtensionPointMonitoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.jmx.extpoints.ExtensionPointMonitoring

  • public final class ExtensionPointMonitoring
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that can be used to provide execution statistics for application extension points. Statistics are made available via the CuramExtensionPointsStats MBean.

    Usage example: 

     ExtensionPointMonitoring.executeExtensionPoint("myExtPoint", new Runnable() {
 
   public void run() {
 
     try {
       extensionPointMethod();
     } catch (RuntimeException e) {
       throw e;
     } catch (Exception e) {
       throw new RuntimeException(e);
     }
   }
 });

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> T executeExtensionPoint(java.lang.String extensionPoint, java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> run)
      Executes the extension point in the provided Callable object and captures execution statistics.
      static void executeExtensionPoint(java.lang.String extensionPoint, java.lang.Runnable run)
      Executes the extension point in the provided Runnable object and captures execution statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • executeExtensionPoint

        public static void executeExtensionPoint(java.lang.String extensionPoint,
                                         java.lang.Runnable run)
        Executes the extension point in the provided Runnable object and captures execution statistics.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - the name of the extension point
        run - the runnable holding the code for the extension point

      • executeExtensionPoint

        public static <T> T executeExtensionPoint(java.lang.String extensionPoint,
                                          java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> run)
                                   throws CuramJMXUtil.CallableException
        Executes the extension point in the provided Callable object and captures execution statistics.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class returned by the Callable
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - the name of the extension point
        run - the Callable holding the code for the extension point
        Returns:
        the result of invoking the Callable's Callable.call() method
        Throws:
        CuramJMXUtil.CallableException - wraps any non runtime exception caused by the execution of the Callable.call() method
